name: Flâner
description:
Flâner is a third-person, slice-of-life game set in a petite town along the French riviera. Leaving behind the suffocation of city lights and an abusive marriage, our protagonist Esme takes a ferry impromptu to the fictional, serene town of Floraison-sur-Mer. Here, by some fortuitous happenstance, a derelict bakery falls into her hands and she reopens the once shining jewel of the town. 

Floraison-sur-Mer sets the scene for Esme’s story of healing, intertwining with the town itself as the player is able to restore life to the neglected bakery, aid in the restoration of local livelihoods, and help other characters through their own journey of healing.
